japanese:
お待たせしましたー！
ただいまより、本日のカップルコンテストを
開催いたしまーす！
translation:
Thank you all very much for waiting!
We will now begin today's couple contest!

japanese:
さあ、参加者の皆さん！
ステージにどうぞ！
translation:
Alright, all participants,
please come up to the stage!

japanese:
思ったよりも大事じゃないか？
もっとこじんまりしたイベントかと思ったんだが。
translation:
It looks a lot more serious than we imagined?
I thought it was going to be a smaller event.

japanese:
う、うん。
結構、参加してる人も多いね。
translation:
Y-yeah,
there are quite a lot of people participating.

japanese: 観客もかなり集まってるし……。
translation: And quite a large audience as well...

japanese:
あ！　あの子じゃね？
Ａチームの子！
translation:
Ah! Isn't that her?
The one from team A!

japanese:
うっわ！
めちゃくちゃ可愛い子がいるってマジじゃん！
translation:
WAAA!
That girl is SUPER cute!

japanese:
んー？
アタシ、あの子見たことある気するんだけど。
translation:
Hmmm?
I feel like I've seen that girl somewhere before.

japanese:
私もー。
誰かに似てるような？
translation:
Me too.
Does she look like someone else?

japanese: うう……。
translation: Ooohh...

japanese:
なあ、この状況で観客の中に一花がいるってバレたら
騒ぎにならないか？
translation:
Hey, wouldn't it cause a commotion
if it's revealed that Ichika
is in the audience, in a situation like this?

japanese:
さっき、眼鏡かけたりして
変装してたから平気だとは思うけど……。
translation:
Well, she disguised herself earlier with glasses,
so I think it's fine...

japanese:
（まあ、一花にだって
　心得はあるだろうし大丈夫か）
translation:
(Well, Ichika should know how to behave
 in this kind of situation, so it should be okay.)

japanese:
それにしても、どうする？
手を抜いてすぐに負けてもいいが――
translation:
But anyway, what should we do?
We could just slack off and lose right away%p-2;――

japanese:
うっえすっぎさーん！　三玖ー！
頑張ってー！
translation:
U-e-su-gi-saaan!
Mikuuu! Do your best!

japanese:
と、まあ、あんな風に応援されてるし、
適当にやって負けるのもな？
translation:
So, well, since we're being cheered on like that,
I guess we can't just lose on purpose now.

japanese:
……うん。
あと、私……みんなに言っちゃったし。
translation:
...Okay.
And, I...told everyone, too.

japanese: フータローは私のだって。
translation: That Futaro's mine.

japanese:
だから、みんなの前で
あっさり負けるのは、ちょっとね。
translation:
So, losing in front of everyone
would be a bit too much.

japanese:
おう。
んじゃ勝ちに行くか。
translation:
Okay.
So, let's win.

japanese: では、ルールを説明します。
translation: Alright, then, now I'll explain the rules.

japanese:
各チームには３つのゲームに挑戦してもらい、
そのうち２つを成功させればクリアとなります。
translation:
Each team will attempt three games,
and if they successfully complete two of them,
they will pass the challenge.

japanese:
クリアしたチームの中で、
最もラブラブっぷりを見せつけてくれた２人を、
観客の皆さんに投票していただきます。
translation:
The couples who have passed the challenge
and demonstrated the most lovey-dovey attitude
will be voted on by the audience.

japanese:
投票で１位になった２人を、
本日のベストカップルと認定しまーす！
translation:
The couple who receives the most votes
will be recognized as today's best couple!

japanese:
最初のゲームは『見つめ合う時間はいつまでも』！
では、さっそく準備させていただきますね！
translation:
The first game is 'Eye Contact for Eternity'!
We'll commence the contest immediately!

japanese:
はい！　見ての通り、
砂浜に向かい合って寝そべる２人の間に
特製ジュースが置かれております！
translation:
Now! As you can see, a special juice is placed
between the two lovebirds,
lying facing each other on the sandy beach!

japanese:
フータロー……。
このコップ、ストローが２本なんだけど……。
translation:
Futaro...
This cup has two straws in it...

japanese: まさか……。
translation: No way...

japanese:
このジュースを、お互い見つめ合ったまま
飲み干していただきまーす！
translation:
The couples will have to drink all of this juice
while looking at each other!

japanese: やっぱりか……！
translation: I knew it...!

japanese:
制限時間中に飲み切れなければアウト。
お互いから視線を逸らしてもアウトです。
translation:
If you don't drink all the juice in time, you're out.
And if you lose eye contact with your partner,
you'll be disqualified.

japanese:
準備はいいですか？
それでは、スタート！
translation:
Are you ready?
Now, let's START!

japanese:
（うううっ！？
　ストローをくわえると、
　やたらと三玖の顔が近い！！）
translation:
(Oooohh?!
 When I put the straw in my mouth,
 Miku's face is so close to mine!!)

japanese: （こんな至近距離は、さすがに……）
translation: (Such close range is indeed...)

japanese:
おやぁ？　Ａチーム、どうしました？
早く飲まないと失格になっちゃいますよ！
translation:
Oh? What's wrong with Team A?
If you don't drink it quickly,
you'll be disqualified!

japanese: んんんんん～！
translation: Nnnnn!

japanese:
おっ！　いい気合いですねー！
ほらほら彼氏さん、負けてられませんよ！
translation:
Oh! What vigor!
Come on, Mr. Boyfriend, you can't be losing now!

japanese: （言われなくてもわかってるわ！）
translation: (I get that, you don't need to say anything!)

japanese: んんんんんんー！
translation: NNNNNN!

japanese: ん、んんんん……。
translation: Nn-nnnn...

japanese: んんんんっ！？
translation: NNNNNN?!
(Miku?!)

japanese: ん、んんんん……。
translation: Nn-nnnn...

japanese:
（き、気持ちはわかる……！
　この至近距離で見つめ合うのはかなり恥ずかしい！
　逸らしたくもなるよな！）
translation:
(I-I understand how she feels!
 It's quite embarrassing to stare at each other
 at such close range! I wanna look away!)

japanese: （だったら、三玖が目を逸らす前に飲み干す！）
translation: (Then, I've gotta drink it all before Miku looks away!)

japanese: 三玖、俺だけ見てろ！
translation: Miku, look ONLY at me!

japanese:
えっ、フータロー？
私の分まで……！
translation:
Huh, Futaro?
You're gonna drink all of it?!

japanese: う、ううう……。
translation: Oo-ooohh...

japanese:
（腹がタプタプだ……。
　色々とギリギリだったな……）
translation:
(My stomach is bloated...
 That was really close...)

japanese: フータロー、大丈夫？
translation: Futaro, are you alright?

japanese:
な、なんてことはないぞぉ！
これくらい軽いもんだ、はははははは！
translation:
O-of course! This is nothing!
Hahahahahaha!

japanese:
三玖こそ、よく頑張ったな！
お前が目を逸らさなかったおかげで、
俺も最後までやり切れた――
translation:
Great job, Miku!
Thanks to you not looking away,
I was able to finish until the end%p-2;――

japanese:
うっ！
すまん、ちょっと休憩で。
translation:
Oooh!
Sorry, let me take a break.

japanese: ……俺だけ見てろ……だって。
translation: ...You told me...to ONLY look at you.

japanese: お次のゲームは『君を抱いてどこまでも』！
translation: The next game is 'Princess in Arms'!

japanese:
男性が女性をお姫様抱っこして制限時間まで耐える！
女性の体が地面についたらアウトです。
translation:
The men will have to princess carry their partner and hold that
position until time's up! If your partner's body
touches the ground, it's game over.

japanese: フータロー、無理しないで。
translation: Futaro, don't try too hard.

japanese:
い、いや！
このくらいできるともっ！
translation:
N-no!
I can definitely do this!

japanese: スタートです！
translation: And, START!

japanese: ふんっ！！
translation: HHNGH!!

japanese: わっ、わわっ！？
translation: W-WAWA?!

japanese:
（よ、よしっ！
　俺だって、このくらいはっ！）
translation:
(A-alright!
 I can do this!)

japanese: すごい、フータロー。
translation: Amazing, Futaro.

japanese:
は、ははは！
あた、りま、え、だ……っ！
translation:
Ha-hahaha!
Th-this, a-ain't, n-nothing!

japanese: でも無理は……。
translation: But, don't strain yourself...

japanese:
む、無理じゃねぇぞ！
あと、少し、くらいなら――
translation:
I-I'm not straining myself!
Just, a little, more%p-2;――

japanese:
ダメだー！
すまん、下ろす！
translation:
I can't hold it!
I'm sorry, I gotta put you down!

japanese: って、おわっ！？
translation: W-WOAH?!

japanese:
おおっと！
彼氏さんが砂に足を取られて倒れ込むも、
自分が下敷きになって彼女さんを守りましたー！
translation:
Oh, wow!
The boyfriend got his foot caught in the sand and fell down,
but managed to get underneath her in time and protected her from the impact!

japanese: いってぇ……。
translation: Owww...

japanese:
フータロー、大丈夫！？
怪我してない！？
translation:
Are you okay, Futaro?!
Are you injured?!

japanese:
な、なんともない。
思ってたより衝撃が少なかったからな。
translation:
I-I'm fine.
The impact wasn't as bad as I thought.

japanese:
……それって、
私がもっと重いと思ってたってこと？
translation:
...Does that mean,
you thought I was heavier than I actually am?

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese: 思ってたんだ。
translation: You did think that, huh?

japanese:
いや、そういう意味じゃない！
受け身を上手く取れたというだけで――
translation:
No, that's not what I meant!
I just meant that I was able to take the fall properly%p-2;――

japanese:
これはこれは！
倒れた後もラブラブっぷりを見せつけてくれるとは、
とっても仲良しですねぇ。
translation:
Wow, take a look at this!
Even after falling, they're still so lovey-dovey!
You guys are such a great couple!

japanese: えっ！？
translation: HUH?!

japanese:
残念ながらクリアならずでしたが、
会場が笑顔でいっぱいです！
いやー、幸せのお裾分け、ありがとうございます！
translation:
Unfortunately, you didn't pass this round,
but the venue is full of smiles!
Thank you for sharing your happiness with us!

japanese: あうう……。
translation: Auuuhh...

japanese:
（ここまでで１勝１敗か。
　次が勝負だな）
translation:
(It's one win and one loss so far.
 The next game is the deciding round.)

japanese:
いよいよラストです！
３つめのゲームは『愛してるを何度でも』！
translation:
Finally, it's the last game!
The third game is 'I Love You, Over and Over Again'!

japanese: （……いままでで一番嫌な予感のする題名だな）
translation: (...This is the most unpleasant title so far.)

japanese:
お２人には、交互に愛してると告げてもらいます。
照れたり笑ったりしたらアウト！
translation:
Both of you will take turns saying 'I love you.'
If you blush or laugh, you lose!

japanese:
（嫌な予感の通りだった！
　人前で愛の告白だと！？）
translation:
(Just as I suspected!
 A public love confession?!)

japanese: む、無理……！
translation: I-impossible!

japanese: さっそく行きましょう、スタートでーす！
translation:
Let's get started,
here we gooo!

japanese: 愛してるよ！
translation: I LOVE you!

japanese: 私も！　愛してるっ！
translation: Me too! I love you so much!

japanese:
（嘘だろ……。
　周りで愛してるが大合唱になってる……）
translation:
(No way...
 Everyone around us is chanting
 'I love you' in chorus...)

japanese: あ……あっ、あいっ！

ぁ……ぁぃ……！
ううう……。
translation:
I-... I lo%p-2;――%p;!
Ooohh...

japanese: ねえ、フータロー。
translation: Hey, Futaro.

japanese: な、なんだ？
translation: Wh-what is it?

japanese:
これ、なんだか、あの時みたい。
学園祭の……。
translation:
This is like, that time, kinda.
At the school festival...

japanese: （……俺が告白した時か）
translation: (...When I confessed.)

japanese:
あの時、私も気持ちを伝えたかったのに、
言葉にできなくて、泣いちゃって……
フータローを困らせた。
translation:
I wanted to convey my feelings to you back then,
but I couldn't put it into words,
and ended up crying...causing trouble to you.

japanese:
困ってねぇよ。
言ったよな、三玖に困らされたことなんてない。
translation:
I wasn't troubled by that.
I told you before,
I've never been troubled by you, Miku.

japanese: うん……。
translation: Yeah...

japanese: あの時よりもっと、フータローが好き。
translation: I like you, now more than I did back then, Futaro.

japanese:
お、俺も、だ。
いまのほうが……もっと三玖が好きだ。
translation:
M-me, too.
I like you...now more than I did back then, too, Miku.

japanese: 私のほうが好きだよ。
translation: I like you more.

japanese: いいや、俺だ。
translation: No, I do.

japanese: ううん、私が――
translation: No, it's me%p-2;――

japanese: ふふっ！
translation: Teehee!

japanese: ……はははっ！
translation: ...Hahaha!

japanese:
Ａチーム、残念！
笑ってしまったのでアウトでーす！
translation:
Team A, I'm so sorry!
You've laughed, so you're out!

japanese:
お待たせしました！
観客投票の集計が終わりましたので、
いよいよ結果発表です！
translation:
Thank you for waiting!
The audience votes have been tallied,
and now it's time for the results!

japanese: 私たちは選ばれないよね？
translation: We won't be chosen, will we?

japanese: ああ、１個しかクリアしてないしな。
translation: Yeah, we only cleared one game.

japanese: 優勝は――
translation: The winner is%p-2;――

japanese: Ａチームのお２人でーす！
translation: The couple from Teeeam A!

japanese: は？
translation: Huh?

japanese: な、なんで……？
translation: Wh-why...?

japanese:
さあさあ、お２人とも！
こちら正面にどうぞ！
translation:
Alright, you two!
Come on up to the front!
H-huh...

japanese:
えー、この通り、
ご本人たちもビックリのご様子ですが……。
translation:
Well-as you can see,
even the winners themselves are surprised
by this turn of events...

japanese:
実はですね、本来お２人は投票対象外なのですが、
なんとぶっちぎりの１位だったのです！
translation:
Actually, the two of you were not originally
included in the voting,
but you clearly deserved the first place!

japanese: ちょっと調査したところ――
translation: After conducting a brief evaluation%p-2;――

japanese:
男の子が転んだ時、
自分から下敷きになったのがかっこよかった。
translation:
When the boyfriend fell, he made himself the cushion,
which was cool.

japanese:
最後のゲームでの様子が青春すぎて眩しくて、
２人以外にないと思った。
translation:
Their performance in the last round
was so youthful and dazzling, to the point
the people have decided that there is no one else worthy of first place but them.

japanese:
などなど、多くのご意見をいただきまして、
ここは特例として優勝ということにいたします！
translation:
We received many such comments,
and we have decided to make an exception
and declare Team A the winners!

japanese: い、いいのかな？
translation: I-is that really okay?

japanese:
まあ、いいんじゃないか？
祭りだしな。
translation:
Well, I think it's fine.
It's a festival after all.

japanese:
では！
コンテストの締めとして、優勝したカップルには
ここでキスをしていただきましょう！
translation:
Now then!
As for the finale of the contest,
let's have the winning couple share a kiss right here!

japanese: え。
translation: Eh.

japanese: え。
translation: Eh.

japanese: えええええ！？
translation: EHHHHHH?!

japanese: き、キス？　ここで！？
translation: A-a kiss? HERE?!

japanese: そ、そんなの聞いてないぞ！
translation: N-no one told me you had to kiss!

japanese:
あれ？
もしかして三玖たちに言ってなかった！？
translation:
Huh?
Did I not tell Miku and the others?!

japanese: 四葉、言ったんじゃないの？
translation: Yotsuba, didn't you tell them?

japanese: 二乃が言ったと思ってた。
translation: I thought you did, Nino?

japanese:
これは、誰かが伝えたと
思い込んでいたということでは……。
translation:
Well, it seems like everyone just assumed
that someone else had told them...

japanese: ど、どうしよう！
translation: Wh-what're we gonna do?!

japanese:
あ、でも、フータローはキスしたいんだった。
じゃあ、ここで……？
translation:
Ah, but wait, didn't you say you wanted
to kiss me?
So, how about here and now...?

japanese: さあ、バチっと行っちゃいましょう！
translation: Alright, now just go ahead and do it!

japanese: 三玖、来い！
translation: Miku, c'mon!

japanese: フータロー！？　で、でもっ！
translation: Futaro?! B-but?!

japanese: 逃げるぞ！
translation: Let's get out of here!
Huh?

japanese: あれ？　ちょっと！？
translation: What the%p-2;――%p;? Hey?!

japanese:
お前とのキスを
見世物にするつもりはないからな！
translation: I'm not gonna make a spectacle out of kissing you!

japanese: 行っちゃいましたね……。
translation: They ran away...

japanese:
えー、では！
初々しいカップルに大きな拍手を～！
translation:
Well then,
let's give a big round of applause
to the innocent couple!
